website_summaries.verdict: The best case available right now. It's a tough and durable case that can withstand a lot of punishment from the average iPhone user.
pros: The polycarbonate material protects the phone against drops and the rigors of everyday use
The design makes it easy to grip
cons: If the phone is dropped screen-down with enough force, it may still crack

customer_reviews.title: Spigen is always a good choice
customer_reviews.text: As always, Spigen makes a quality case that holds up to the abuse I put my phones through. I wouldn't be able to have a smartphone if it weren't for the screen protectors and cases that keep them in working order. Every Spigen case I've ever had has been up to the task of keeping my electronics safe, and at a reasonable price too.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Superior Design and Quality at a fraction of the price of that case named after the aquatic mammal.
customer_reviews.text: A result of good engineering, prototyping, testing, precision fit (especially the buttons), quality construction and materials ! This is a great case and a superb value. The case is as durable as other ballistic type competitors yet slimmer and easier to carry. I work in the field and I bought this case after my third cracked screen after dropping and suffering a corner strike. With this case, it has been dropped on the corners several times without any damage to the screen. The feature I find unique and very useful is the tiny standoffs on the back side, preventing the phone from getting wet if it is placed on the table on a spill! Well Done Spigen!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey J. Stuk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Previously had an otterbox. It was a bit cumbersome and the screen protector was plastic. And the case cracked. Bought this since I have a Spigen case on a Nexus 6P for 3 years that I like. Case fits 10/10 and feels great in the hand. It does not come with a screen protector but I'd rather that than come with a crappy plastic one. I bought the spigen tempered glass screen protector and it fits perfect with the case and the phone feels like new even though it is over 4 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet well designed.
customer_reviews.text: One of my pet peeves with phone cases is that they can add a lot of bulk, weight, stickiness (from rubber), and bad looks to a beautifully designed phone. This case does a good job of providing adequate protection while looking nice. It's also not so rubbery that it sticks in your pocket when you try to remove it, but the rubber is sticky enough that it's not going to slip out of your hands. If you're looking at this one for your phone, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Idlewild and Sage

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: I hope they never stop making these cause they are the best phone cases I've ever found. They're so light weight and non-bulky but offer full protection from even the worst phone-dropping offenders (me). I've dropped my phone on cement, flat on it's face, at an angle and from varying heights over the years, and my phone has never gotten so much as a scratch on it because of the design of these phone cases. I cannot recommend them highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Does not protect the screen AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect much protection from this case. It might look cool and protect the back and sides of the phone but it does nothing to protect the screen. The cases edges are nearly flush with the screen giving it no protection from facedown drops. I dropped my brand new iPhone 6 off of my lap, it landed face down, and my screen still shattered. There is NOTHING heavy duty or tough about this case. It's really not much different than any cheapo chinese made case. I'd highly recommend spending the extra money and going for a waterproof LifeProof case or something similar instead of this piece of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: D Money

customer_reviews.title: Very protective but beware of a small opening for headphone jack!
customer_reviews.text: One thing to note, I stupidly didn't check and it's totally my fault but the headphone jack port is not super accessible. If your headphones have a thicker jack (my audio technica m30 for example) it won't fit. I had to do some light engineering aka cutting off plastic to get it to fit and even still its rather tight fit. The edges on the bottom of the power hole are rather sharp as well, so if you hold it from the bottom it can get uncomfortable at times, but nothing too awful. All in all an okay purchase, probably wouldn't rebuy it but I don't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Billiam

customer_reviews.title: Great simple cases
customer_reviews.text: I got a Spigen case like this back when I got my iPhone 6 and I loved it. I had the same case for a few years until time had finally worn down the volume buttons and the card slot on the back was torn. So I ordered a replacement, this one. Very pleased with it, other than that it didn't have a card slot. But that's my fault for not paying attention to what I was ordering. The old one protected my phone from a few falls, and I think it just looks nice. High durability on these, my first one lasted 3 or 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Teachnor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't protect from a 30 in. drop
customer_reviews.text: The rubber is too hard to provide any real grip when trying to prop up the phone on a table or desk. The phone fell from my car seat to the parking lot (about 30 inches) and the screen cracked. I'm not convinced this was better than no phone cover at all. I should have ponied up the money for an Otter Case in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: RiverWolf

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 6S great.
customer_reviews.text: When my dog bit into the screen of my iPhone I had to get a replacement. I bought a renewed 6S through Amazon, which is a great deal, and wanted a new case for the phone as the old one had some bite marks on it. This new Spigen Tough Armor case is ideal. Tough without being too bulky. I like to keep my phone in my shirt pocket and some case are just too big for that, but not the Spigen.
customer_reviews.author: Don W

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Protector
customer_reviews.text: I used this protector on my iPhone 6. Simply put, it looks great, feels great and it fits perfectly. The charge port opening is wide enough to use my aftermarket charger with no issues and the phone is not bulky at all as I have experienced with other protectors. I cannot attest as to how well it will protect my phone if I were to drop it but I have no doubt that it will fair better than if I did not have it on. I really like this case. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Cool case
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little sharp on the rounded edges, it holds my iPhone very securely, paint scratched after 5 months of use. Overall it’s very slim, low profile and doesn’t add any noticeable weight or bulk. I’ve dropped my phone a few times and it didn’t fail me. 4 stars because it could be softer on the edges
customer_reviews.author: Redline

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: This case fits snuggly on my phone and is not super chunky. I needed just a mid range case to protect my phone from occasional drops and this is perfect. I didn’t need waterproofing or the strong durability of otter box and didn’t want a super thick casing like otter boxes have. This is just what I was looking for and at the right price too!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great protection without feeling big!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cover in the market. this is the second one i've bought, the first one was for my iphone 5s, now evolved to iphone 6.
customer_reviews.author: Angel G Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this brand/ style case for years now. I have dropped my phone countless times over the years and never seen any damage to the phone. The sides are raised enough that even with dropping, I have not cracked my screen (I also use a glass screen protector). The product looks sleek and the matte finish on the back makes it easy to hold without slipping out. Great value for the money and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Jeries

customer_reviews.title: It's OK Hope it works.
customer_reviews.text: The case holds the phone well but the plastic piece around the rubber looks very cheap and the case is pretty thin. The screen extends beyond the case itself and I am sure if dropped at the right angle the glass will shatter but lets hope it doesn't fall at that angle!!! LOL I am giving it 4 stars with the hopes that it will protect my phone.
customer_reviews.author: James Troche

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is virtually identical to the previous Spigen that I used for 6 years before it finally gave up the ghost, and that one saved my iPhone from countless collisions with concrete. These are very good-looking, durable and effective phone protectors. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: opinionatED

customer_reviews.title: Color rubbed off!
customer_reviews.text: We only had this case for about 3 months. The product did it’s job protecting the phone but the silver/gray color rubbed off and now I have purple marks all over my furniture and leather ottoman! So annoyed! I don’t know if there is something in the color that rubbed off! Horrible! I tried the magic eraser and it faded lightly but I was afraid to rub hard to not damage the wood or leather!
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: Durable phone case and easy to keep a firm hold of. I have dropped my phone with this case and have never had the unfortunate instance where I needed to replace the screen. I had this on my phone for over 3 years and it has held up against the test of time and some intense wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: KRN

customer_reviews.title: Fits well..quick wearing
customer_reviews.text: The phone fits securely in the case. It feels well protected BUT the back of the case is sort of a grey plastic painted to look like metal. It wears extremely fast. I've only had this a few weeks and there are already scratches and chips in this grey metal-esque bit. I had a Otterbox Commuter for 3 years and it didn't look as bad as this thing after only a few weeks. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: lyonsroar

customer_reviews.title: The real deal and a killer price.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the case being genuine, but i checked the serial number on Spigen's website and its the real deal. I will never buy another brand of phone cases. i had one on my old phone and loved it. This case offers protection that is second to none, and looks sleek and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.text: I found this item comfortable to hold. I like the angular surfaces of this case far better than the rounded edges of most of the other products I considered. This is a great looking cell phone case with treat build quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sconion

customer_reviews.title: A Well-fitting Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: This phone case is really good. It hugs the phone in a tight grip, looks good, and seems really durable - it'll definitely outlast any other phone case I've ever used before. My only complaint, but a small one, is that the case buttons that control the volume and turning the phone on & off are not really very distinct by touch - mostly I have to actually look at the case to see the buttons to make volume adjustments rather than just be able to feel them with my fingers. Overall tho, it's a really a nice looking, rugged case
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: %th one in as many year now. Hard to find for a iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: I keep hanging onto my iPhone 6 cause it keeps working but finding cases for it are getting hard to find. I beat the heck out of mine and this is the 5th one in 5 years now and I just like them. Paired with the MaxBoost screen protectors, a hard combo to beat.
customer_reviews.author: James W Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great case, good price, would def recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking for a fairly streamline yet decent protecting phone case. If I had my way, and didn't have to worry about potential drops, I wouldn't have a case at all on my phone. This case delivered. its built tough enough to protect against occasional drops, but sleek enough to slide in and out of pockets easy, and also has a good angled edge for gripping the phone well. I have since had 3-4 friends/co-workers purchase this same case (different colors) after I showed it to them. Good price point, and has held up well thus far. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: West1134

customer_reviews.title: Really nice case
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice case to hold... the edges are a bit beveled and fit in your fingers nicely. I haven't dropped the phone in it yet but it appears that it would protect pretty well... and it was not too $$.
customer_reviews.author: NOLAexpat

customer_reviews.title: good case with a couple minor flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case; buttons are a bit stiff. Pros: fits the phone wonderfully and is rubberized at all the likely impact points. Feels sturdy and though I haven't dropped my new phone yet, I'm sure it's protected. Cons: I don't personally care for the feel of the buttons on this case, makes the volume and power buttons a bit stiff (personal preference - I guess I'd rather have cutouts for the buttons). The lip of the case on the screen side could stand to extend a *bit* higher above the screen. I did have to use an x-acto knife to trim the cutout for the headphones a bit (standard iphone headset fits just fine though). Still, a decent case overall.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit on my 6S
customer_reviews.text: This has been out of the packaging on on my phone for less than 10 minutes. But I can already give it a great review. Popped right onto my 6S without a struggle and is very secure. This is exactly what I was looking for in a case... Rugged protection with rubberized edges, slight lip that prevents screen from touching surface when face down, reduces the "slip factor" when holding the phone, and not too much bulk. My previous iPhone had an Otterbox Commuter case which was excellent... but for the price, this one can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzard Mom

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case almost 2 years ago and had to come leave a review. I’m a SAHM to 3 under 3, that means my phone gets dropped, thrown, drooled on...practically everything, and this case has protected it from it! My oldest is a rough and tumble boy and he has literally thrown my phone across the room onto the tile floor and there is not a sincle crack or scratch to show for it. Best bang for your buck! It’s about time to grab another case for a new phone and you bet I’m eyeing this!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for I Phone 6
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an I Phone 6. The hole for the camera lens in the back covers almost half of the lens. It should not be advertised as an I Phone 6 cover.
customer_reviews.author: dikran bairamian

customer_reviews.title: Case is super strong and does the job of protecting the iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Case is super strong and does the job of protecting the iPhone. Please Note: Purchase a screen (tempered glass) protector in order to further protect the iPhone screen, do not depend on the case to protect the screen. Other than that, the case is wonderful, heavy duty and light in weight. Even though it adds centimeters to the phone, it is WORTH it for the PROTECTION of the shock proof built into the case. This is my 2nd one because a family member liked it so much they TOOK it from me!
customer_reviews.author: LeiSina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality phone case
customer_reviews.text: I love the look & feel of this case. Bought it to replace an Otterbox Commuter case because the price was attractive. The material is smooth & it is a very nice looking case. The only downfall is there is no cover for the charging plug. I'm in & out of dust & dirt so I went back to other Otterbox. If your looking for a good quality, inexpensive phone case & don't work in a lot of dirt this is the case for you.
customer_reviews.author: Swan

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found so far.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this case for a month now. I have tried multiple cases for my iPhone so far and this one is the best to date. The 2 other cases I removed within a week due to annoyances or a feeling of not being good enough to protect from a fall. This case protects the phone from a fall at any angle. It sticks out long enough to cover the screen. It's looks good and feels good. My only grief is the back coloring scratches on my magnetic car vent holder. You can see the scratches when tilting towards light and looking close so it's not noticeable from a distance or in low light.
customer_reviews.author: GeMan

customer_reviews.title: Combat Armor for Your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Yup, it's got a hole so you can let people know it's an iPhone. But I don't really care to show off. I got a black phone. I drop it enough times that I want the corners and screen protected. I used to go with Element Case which has a similar design, but decided to try this since it was similar but less expensive. I love it! Already saved my bacon from a corner impact from dropping it a few times now. Definitely a great case if you don't mind the sleek iPhone shape being bulked up and made a bit more masculine with angular edges.
customer_reviews.author: M. JohnsonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, it does everything they state in the add. I did buy a ballistic glass cover for it, and have dropped this phone with this case 4 times in 3 months. Each time it has fallen on the corner of the case, with no damage to the phone at all. The case has some minor scratches on it, but I am happy to have them on the case and not the phone. I have recommended this same case to friend who has a iPhone 6 plus and he loves the case also. He is very clumsy with his phone and drops his at least twice as much as I have. His phone has no issues as well.
customer_reviews.author: ALHBSH

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Got this case for my husband and he loves it. Very sturdy and very easy to slip the phone into it. I’ve had some iPhone cases where I worried I was either going to break my phone or the case or both. Not the case with this one. Nice tight fit and the phone is secure.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Lee Stee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many cell phone cases throughout the years and this one is my favorite. I’m writing this review 5 years later and the case is still going strong. When I drop it, nothing breaks or shatters. When I hold the phone, the case feels slim and streamlined. Not much bulk is added. It feels sleek. The buttons to increase/decrease volume and power on/off are well outlined and satisfying to push. I can charge my phone and use the headphones while this case is on. I’ve recommended this case to many friends and do the same here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Case, held up for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Retiring my iPhone 6. This was the first and only case I bought. Dropped it dozens upon dozens of times over the last 3 years. Held up fine performance wise. I did buy a screen protector as well. If you are new to the iPhone 6 market, look no further than this case.
customer_reviews.author: oioi123

customer_reviews.title: I really like this case the only thing I dislike is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case the only thing I dislike is the hard plastic back cover is extremely hard to take off once its properly in place.. I use this case with a tempered glass screen protector and my phone is very protected.. The case doesnt add as much size as most others either.. I have slammed my Iphone 6 on the trradmill when my hand hooked the headphones while running.. It hit very hard with no damage at all.. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brewmaster C

customer_reviews.title: Best cases
customer_reviews.text: Spigen makes arguably one of the best phone cases you can buy. Some of them have not held up as well as I would have liked however this particular series is great. I have dropped my phone and even almost slammed it to the ground in some cases (you know when you try to stop yourself from dropping something but you inadvertently cause it to accelerate towards the ground more quickly?). Would not hesitate to continue buying these cases for any phone I own.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This case fits the iPhone 6 perfectly. It's ultra protective, but adds very little bulk. The thick rubber corners have saved my device on numerous occassions. I've dropped it from a few feet up onto my driveway and it just bounces. Provides excellent protection. There is a slight lip around the front of the phone which prevents the device from being able drop directly onto the screen. Had no problem fitting a tempered glass screen protector on the phone with this case. Buttons & camera are fully accessible. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabonz

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: This case is a great snug fit. With the rubber first layer it will not damage my phone as other cases have. I only wish the edges were slightly more raised for my piece of mind. I have dropped my phone a few times already mostly when I forget it's on my lap and stand up it holds up will and my phone was protected. It is not bulky at all. I was a bit scared when installing it though as the plastic was stuck on the rubber. I felt like u was gonna break it when taking it apart.
customer_reviews.author: BellaJoe

customer_reviews.title: Great item A+++
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my dad's phone. I bought him a cover for a 5S and after that, even the iPad has one of these, he loves Tough Armor cases.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Good - not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the case - feels very sturdy and yet is fairly low profile. We have it on all four iPhones in our household. Only comments are 1) The back is slick so you have to get used to holding it from the rubberized from portion or it can slip - mine has a couple of times, but the case did its job and phone was undamaged. 2) It does collect dust between the phone and the case - I open it up once a month and clean up, but this can be an issue for some. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Backfire

customer_reviews.title: For son who likes to drop phones
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my teenage son who tends to destroy everything we get him. He likes it because it is slim for such a sturdy case that protects it from drops.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Rouzaud

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Protective Case, but get a screen protector as well.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid phone case, mainly for protecting the back. It removes the protruding camera issue the iPhone 6 has, and is very light and doesn't scratch easily. Now, note that I said it protects the back - the lip on the front of the case is near-nonexistent, so if you're a notorious phone-dropper and want this case, I highly recommend buying a screen protector. Personally I prefer the Flexion Guardian cover, but that's your choice. Overall a great case, barely adds weight to the phone while still making it easier to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: It is tough it is comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it so much! Every time he reaches for his phone he says something about his case. It is tough it is comfortable to hold, it protects your device perfectly. Luckily he hasn't drop his phone or stepped on it or anything so I wouldn't kno abou the performance in action of this case, but overall for normal daily use it is great. He was looking for one of these for his Ipad, but couldn't find one. Highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: LuRoggio

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case super durable I highly reccomend this style of case from this brand they last forever and protect the phone so well! I’ve never dropped it and the case fall apart which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. That's All You Need to Know
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these things 4 years ago. The rubber ring around it finally cracked last month, so I bought another one. Strongest, best cover for iPhone 6S+ you're ever going to find.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough great things about Spigen! These cases are spectacular. I have used these for years and I love the changeability with the hard layers. This case has saved me over and over again with numerous drops and I mean numerous hard drops! I love the two layers and it really does protect it. The buttons are easy to press and I have never had any issues
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bourg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sleek, quality case
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case on my iPhone 6 for about 8 months now and it is great. I have dropped my phone a few times but the case is very protective and keeps your iPhone safe. I have gotten many compliments from friends because they like the design of the case and it is also pretty slim and easy to insert and remove from pockets. There is a little wear and tear on the back of the case but that is expected when you drop your case on concrete multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: A-MAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many (more than a dozen) different iPhone cases over the years. Some of them have been so poor in quality that they started to deteriorate after a few week - so I can only imagine the lack of protection that existed for my phone. The Spigen Tough Armor case is the best on the market... BY FAR! Not only is it well priced, it has great protection for the phone, is durable, and also is fairly stylish. I have already recommended this to close to a dozen of my co-workers!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: product phone well!
customer_reviews.text: i had one before and it protects your iPhone really well! only bad thing about it, is that paint doesn't last very long. it scratches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed Case.  Worth Getting.
customer_reviews.text: Coming up on 1 year of use with my iPhone 6, all the while having the Spigen Heavy Duty Tough Armor case on it. I don't drop my phone often but, I definitely have a few times over the entire year and with this case I have incurred no dents or cracked screens. Also, it hardly makes the phone bulkier AND it barely 'sticks to your pockets' when you try to pull it out. This was a well designed case and well worth my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Spigen Tough armor only cases I use. A++
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this case looks great. Many people ask me what kind of case is that and I'm surprised they haven't heard about Spigen. It has superior protection, I don't even worry about my phone when I drop it. Even when it's a violent drop. Its not bulky either. It has a small lip so your screen isn't touching the surface when it's set face down. You can't beat this price or protection. Must have item!
customer_reviews.author: Kafr Malik

customer_reviews.title: nice case fits well,seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: a great case for my 6s,the only problem i have with it is trying to find the buttons on the side. the case makes the buttons flush with the side ,maybe some tactile device(bumps or whatever) would make them easier to find
customer_reviews.author: nc

customer_reviews.title: The best case I have found for an iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Adds durability and protection to the phone without adding bulkiness. In the past I have used OtterBox and LifeProof products however they just seemed to make the phone seem much larger and bulkier than I wanted so I opted to try this case out. 5 months later and I still love it. It's easy to take on and off if you want to clean your phone or put it into a running arm band (not the case with an OtterBox or LifeProof).
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Case but Beware of the Sun!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for nearly a year, and it has been through a lot. I will say that, physically, I have no complaints. It's easy to clean, comfortable, and doesn't add too much bulk. The only negative -- and this can happen with any case -- is the open Apple circle logo. I place my phone screen-down when I'm outside, and that has led to some sun fading on the phone's metal finish. Certainly not noticeable if the case is on but, with the case off, my phone has a leopard spot now.
customer_reviews.author: mario02423

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a big bulky case like Otterbox. More streamline and fits into pockets pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Definitely a little "beefier" than my previous case. I ordered this one after having a previous minimal Spigen case. The result of that case was a drop and shattered screen. I immediately ordered this new case, got the screen repaired and am hoping the new case can handle any possible future drops. Its working well - fingers crossed no more broken screens! Definitely not a big bulky case like Otterbox. More streamline and fits into pockets pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Milani

customer_reviews.title: Phone case review
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case on two phones now. It’s a great case cans deal with many drops and whatever general ware and tear I can throw at it. The only reason I had to buy a second one is cause I dropped my phone in the ocean and I couldn’t recover it. I do know it’s probably sitting on the ocean floor securely in the case.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I really do love my new case
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my phone 3 times in two months...3 of those times, I have had to replace my screen and/or LCD screen. I finally decided to opt for one of the less "stylish" cases and go for protection instead. Well, needless to say, I really do love my new case. It's a lot more sleek and attractive than some heavy duty protective cases - say the otterbox. It's really a preference thing of course...but the case also gives a pretty good amount of grasp so it's not so sleek that it'll slip right out of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It only protects the phone body not screen
customer_reviews.text: Well first I will say I’m very disappointed I’m the case... I had it only for 2 weeks I believe and my phone dropped and the screen shattered. If you do get this case I will definitely recommend a screen protector
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bow down to Spigen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone case product line that has protected both a 6 and 8+ over the course of at least 5 years. I am quite clumsy and the protection this case provides allows me to literally throw my phone across the room with zero worry of damage. Seriously. I shamefully admit I do that sometimes. Buy this case!! I don’t care what phone you have you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Carter Horvath

customer_reviews.title: It's a good case, lacking grip.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice case. Most breaks are caused by striking the side of the phone and this case protects the side well. A lot of complaints over broken phones stating that the phone fell perfectly horizontal but the minimum height of the bumper caused the break- I hope anyone can tell that is a bit exaggerated. My only early complaint is it's slick surface. I'm eventually going to cut pieces of vinyl for some grip, all in all, it's a good case. I've dropped my phone before having a case three times and the screen didn't break so all the screen breaks are situational.
customer_reviews.author: T. Newbanks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and easy to slip over your phone. I had this on my iPhone 6 for about 1 week before it fell from waste-high and hit the blacktop parking lot at my dentist...not a single mark on the case itself and no damage to the phone. HORRIBLE feeling as it fell, but the case saved it. The black part of the case is softer than the grey part and the two together make it very sturdy but NOT bulky. It easily slides in/out of my pocket and still has that iPhone 6 slim profile.
customer_reviews.author: Gary DeBro

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Ugly but Durable
customer_reviews.text: As the klutz I am, I had to order a very protective case. Even though I drop my phone multiple times on any given day, it still hasn't a crack on it. The case itself is a bit scratched up but still in good condition. I wouldn't say it's the prettiest looking product but it gets the job done. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who's clumsy and want a long lasting case.
customer_reviews.author: PaakowE

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy iPhone case that wont let you down!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is aesthetically appealing and I just love how it looks, the case also fit the phone perfectly. This is my first product with Tough Armor and I am very pleased, it has saved my phone from 2/3 drops but a few scuffs on the case no phone damage. From the moment you put it on your phone you can tell it is a very sturdy and a very tough case that will protect your phone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Farhan

customer_reviews.title: I however was a bit disappointed in the fact of how sharp the edges were
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mainly to protect my phone and I feel it will do that to the extent I expected. I however was a bit disappointed in the fact of how sharp the edges were. It was designed with two defined edges all around the case. That and the hardness of the case material made it feel uncomfortable as I held the phone in one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Mountain Comp Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Protection...
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome. Now when you drop your phone you don't have to worry. Also, was less than half the price as retail stores. Can't miss with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try it you’ll like it
customer_reviews.text: The Best cover I’ve had so far!! Love the volume, on and off buttons, this one gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Melton

customer_reviews.title: bought to fit the holster
customer_reviews.text: seems everyone i know has this case. i got this case because i accidentally ordered the matching holster thinking it came with case. the holster is great so if you need both get these together. the case itself is good but I think it destroys the iphone 6 looks (almost makes it a retro iphone5) i thought i could order extra metal parts to change to overall look but I can't find just that piece for sale. i have dropped my phone numerous times so now the metal part has scratches on the corners of the sides... kind of like the iphone5...but my iphone6 is still perfect inside. every 6-7 months i take the case off to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: My husband truly likes this case for it fits well and easy to carry. It protects the phone as described.
customer_reviews.author: Founa

customer_reviews.title: How about that?
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. Priced right and it fits my I phone 6 like a glove. It seems verey sturfy and secure without being "beefy." I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zip

customer_reviews.title: Okay at best, for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had this case for about a year or so and it started to not look as great. The oils from my hands started leaving prints on the back that I couldn't clean off and it was pretty noticeable. Also, after a few months and a few drops the case started to crack around the edges. But by far the worse part about this case was the fact that you had to push pretty hard on the volume and lock buttons for them to work, which is extremely annoying. Overall, just an okay case for the price, but there's better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Swihart

customer_reviews.title: This case snapped onto my phone easily and precisely
customer_reviews.text: This case snapped onto my phone easily and precisely. And when it did, I seriously felt like I had bought a suit of armor. It looks sleek and tactical... and it feels great. The buttons and ports align perfectly, and it doesn't feel any more cumbersome than when my phone was naked. Since this case does not come with a screen protector, I added Maxboost tempered glass which fit precisely on the phone and did not interfere with the case. I'm usually very careful when handling my phone, but with the two of these products in place I've found myself worrying a lot less about dropping it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K.

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY case to get for protection w/ great look + feel for your iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The only case I have used in the past few years for my I phones. I have accidentally dropped my phone many times with this case on, and the phone is still in perfect condition. The buttons work seamlessly with the phone, and the case does not stick in your pocket when you try to pull it out like other cases. Also, the headphone jack is wide enough to accept any inputs, when sometimes I have had to pull other cases off to listen to music in the car. Also, the lip on the front screen is amazing because it protects your glass if you lay the phone down on its face! Get this case, it rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Grizzlee Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice slim case with only one concern
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st Spigen case. In the past, I used Otterbox. This one seems as sturdy, cheaper and MUCH LESS BULKY. the only thing that kept it from getting 5 stars was my concern over the durability of the metal back. Its not laying completely flush on the top right corner (non-camera corner). It appears to be slightly warped and my concern is that it will get worse with time as it catches on pockets etc. Overall it seems to be a solid, slim, strong case
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Drop protection
customer_reviews.text: I have dropped my iPhone 6 a couple of time on concrete, and it held up just fine. The case can scratch, but better the case than the phone. Lightweight and provides the expected level of protection with little additional bulk or weight, at a good cost. Will buy again for my next phone (Actually bought, not given a demo)
customer_reviews.author: D M Watts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: These are a very heavy duty case, hence the name. I love my case! I have already bought two in different colors. They are long lasting, durable, and have a sleek, fashionable look. It doesn't get much better then this. I would strongly reccoment buying one of these cases. I have dropped my phone on the screen multiple times but the phone is left without a scratch. Although it completely protects my phone, I would reccoment getting a screen protector to go along with it to better protect the phone. Overall, a great product. Thanks Spigen!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Quality case
customer_reviews.text: Just needed something to protect my new phone, but the look and feel of this made me feel like I certainly got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Drop my phone all the time and it’s protects it well. I recommend a glass screen protecter to prevent shattering
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: It Survived!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review since I had not dropped my phone, so there was really now telling how great it was. For the protection provided, the case is really slim! I was impressed. I had the same model for my 5s and it seems they were able to make this one much slimmer. I was worried about how this would effect the durability. Low and behold, I dropped my phone from about waist high smack down on the outside concrete. I was terrified to turn it over as it had landed on the edge (usually a deal breaker). My case a little scuff on the side, but my phone was perfectly in tact. A+
customer_reviews.author: Hillary S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, quality case for older phone.
customer_reviews.text: Love spigen cases, durable and good looking. This case has been through it all and keeps going.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyTheBrutalPoodle

customer_reviews.title: Best case I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I've been through many different smart phones over the years for work (Blackberry, Windows phone, iPhone, and Android). To me, the new Androids and iPhones are very slippery and light without a case, so I like to have a bit of rubber grip on the sides. This has been my favorite case to date. I recently switched from Galaxy S6 back to iPhone and had this case for both. It has enough grip on the sides to keep me from dropping it, but also slides in/out of my jeans pockets with ease. And I have dropped it a couple of times from table height on very hard surface. Phone has survived each and every time!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeShopper

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part: front side of the case had 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Was dropped from 120 feet onto hard dirt floor during zip lining. A bit of scuffing and scratches but otherwise intact case and phone! Lots of thought was put into design with the air cushion in each of the four corners really helping absorb shock. My favorite part: front side of the case had 4 small bumps which keeps the case slightly above whatever surface you put it on keeping the case clean even when put on a sticky or dirty table/surface.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Tan

customer_reviews.title: Slim and protective
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite case on the market. It is super slim and offers a ton of protection. I have dropped my phone so many times and the case has never failed me. The only down side is no screen protector which I prefer but I know others see it as a negative.
customer_reviews.author: caleb thompson

customer_reviews.title: Durable, hard rubber.
customer_reviews.text: Fitss the iPhone 6 very well. I like the low profile. I will agree that the lip around the glass is low, maybe the thickness of a dime in height above the glass. I have dropped several time and have no damage. The rubber case is a hard rubber. It has very prominent edges that can be a discomfort, depending on how you hold your phone. Specifically the edges on the bottom of the phone around the charger hole, earbud hole and speaker. I like it and am not disappointed with it after I got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look on line, protecting a $650 purchase seems like a no-brainier - although many of my students don't seem to think so! Yes, this makes the phone bigger and heavier, but it is pretty sleek and good looking, and easy to install. Metal edge next to mute button may be a design hassle, we'll have to see. So far so good, although the proof will be in the longevity. Delivered on time and as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Hd Lemng

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just received. has sleek and lightweight design. Phone is much cooler which is why I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Slick, and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, nice design. Definitely an upgrade to most cases out there.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels good. On the wife's phone so we will see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Moorhead

customer_reviews.title: The "gunmetal" variant scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: The case does it's job well by protecting my case. My only issue with the case is how easily it scratches. Though my phone has yet to be dropped and is typically the only item in my pocket, there are already plethora of scratches on the back of the case. At such an amazing price, nonetheless, I will simply buy an extra case once the scratches become worse.
customer_reviews.author: Juke

customer_reviews.title: Too Many Sharp Edges and Corners
customer_reviews.text: I think the aesthetics and sturdiness of this case are very good. I am however, very disappointed in the sharp corners and edges around the silent switch and bottom earphone and power ports. These sharp corners and edges are very uncomfortable especially along the bottom of the phone. When texting or sending an email I have grown accustomed to cradling the bottom of the phone with my pinkie fingers. These edges make it uncomfortable and even slightly painful to hold the phone in the way that many of us do. Looks and ability to protect the phone get a 4 star rating. Ergonomics gets 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: FlowPazz1

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Protects the phone very well, but still keeps a pretty thin overall profile. Has a rubberized material around the front to protect the screen and some rubber on the backside so the phone doesn't slide off my center console. The finish doesn't last very long before it rubs off, exposing the white plastic underneath but I didn't feel it was enough to dock it a star.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walling

customer_reviews.title: Phone case
customer_reviews.text: Han an otter box, the bottom fell apart, this is sturdy and more durable
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Spigen iPhone 6 Case
customer_reviews.text: I spent quite a bit of time cross-referencing reviews for iPhone 6 cases, and this is the one I landed on. It is durable, fits well, and is not bulky like previous cases I have had! I have already dropped my phone a couple of times since I put this case on, and my phone does not have any damage to it. The black color is sleek and the case is easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kaili Kobylka

customer_reviews.title: Well...
customer_reviews.text: Tough case, but it partially blocks the camera lens. Not too pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J Edward Neill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, not as heavy duty as I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, not as heavy duty as I thought but worked out better than it wasn't as it still fits into smaller pockets on certain work style pants. Case is flexible enough to still come off easy as needed. Listen this aint gonna save your phone if you drop it (there is little that will) but it will offer some level of protection from day to day use outside of wrapping it in bubble wrap. I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip but not the most comfortable thing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable lip around edge to protect screen if you have a glass screen protector on unlike some cases out there. Easy to grip but not the most comfortable thing to hold for the long run. Feels like it might allow the phone to pop out if it fell the wrong way - hasn't happened to me yet but something to consider. Got this as a temporary case while I awaited something better. For the price it does a pretty good job but there are better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Clostridium

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't intend to actually try the product so quickly, but a day after i put the new cover it fell from the top of my SUV into the ground when I tried to grab it after I have placed there to grab something from my back seat. The phone had no damaged whatsoever, not even a scratch. Glad I had the new cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Martinez

product_meta.title: Spigen Tough Armor Designed for Apple iPhone, Designed for 6 (2014) / iPhone 6s (2015) - Gunmetal
product_meta.description: Color:TA GunmetalThe Tough Armor case for the iPhone 6 provides impact absorption while staying less bulky than other protective cases. The dual layered build of flexible TPU and hard polycarbonate come with protective features such as Air Cushioned corners and an interior spider-web pattern.
feature_bullets: Intense fortification = Dual layers + Air Cushion Technology
0.7mm lip and 4-point rear guards for front & back panel protection

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,986 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
